mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (user_type, i_user, user_id, user_pw, salt, nm, bd, gender, profile_img) VALUES (#{user_type}, #{i_user}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{salt}, #{nm}, #{bd}, #{gender}, #{profile_img})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(i_user) as i_user FROM t_user
SELECT A.i_rest, A.i_user, A.r_dt , B.nm AS rest_nm , B.addr AS rest_addr FROM t_user_favorite A INNER JOIN t_restaurant B ON A.i_rest = B.i_rest WHERE A.i_user = #{i_user}
